heroPageMontessori.paragraph: We prioritize personalized Montessori education while nurturing group unity through camaraderie, affection, and fairness

aboutMontessoriHeaderContent.paragraph: Our aim is to promote the well-rounded growth of each child, emphasizing independence and tolerance, following the Montessori approach with five subject areas.

montessoriMethodsList.paragraph: Practical life activities encompass a progressively demanding set of motor tasks with real-world purposes, like tidying a table or washing dishes. These activities not only aid children in mastering everyday chores but also cultivate independence, physical dexterity, coordination, focus, and a notion of organization.

Montessori's sensorial education focuses on honing a child's sensory perception by consistently engaging with purposefully crafted materials.
This approach aims to offer tangible instances that illustrate otherwise abstract notions, including elements like color, texture, sound, and fragrance.

The Montessori classroom is meticulously arranged to organically foster the acquisition of skills vital for both spoken and written language. Children employ sandpaper letters to grasp the phonetics of the alphabet and the precise formation of each letter.

Through the use of hands-on materials designed
around the decimal system, children learn important
mathematical principles. Maria Montessori demonstrated
that if a child is able to learn during the stage
when they enjoy manipulating materials, they will be able
to more easily and successfully assimilate
the skills and knowledge of arithmetic.

In this domain, children delve into a range of subjects, including Geography, History, Biology, Art, and Music. This broad exploration provides them with the chance to gain a deeper understanding of their surroundings. This facet of children's education empowers our students to uncover the richness of both historical and contemporary cultures while also examining the realms of living and non-living entities.

heroPageBilingual.paragraph: We prioritize personalized Montessori education while nurturing group unity through camaraderie, affection, and fairness.

aboutBilingualHeaderContent.paragraph: Language immersion introduces young learners to English in an immersive environment, promoting early language acquisition and fluency development.

bilingualProgramContent.description: We are a kindergarten that combines the development of musical sensitivity with language education. In a warm and family-like atmosphere, we cultivate a love for music by surrounding children with sound, melody, and rhythm. The space we create facilitates the acquisition of skills for expressing emotions and communicating needs. We also spend a lot of time in our beautiful garden.

We are a kindergarten that combines the development of musical sensitivity with language education. In a warm and family-like atmosphere, we cultivate a love for music by surrounding children with sound, melody, and rhythm. The space we create facilitates the acquisition of skills for expressing emotions and communicating needs. We also spend a lot of time in our beautiful garden.

With us, children will have a wonderful time at picnics and family events. During outdoor, corporate, and family meetings, we provide interesting activities, conduct experiments, games, and play. With us, little ones will joyfully spend unforgettable time at corporate picnics and family gatherings.

heroPageParty.paragraph: Orchestration of the delightful and fun-filled birthday parties for the little ones, full of joy, games, and memorable moments.

partyAccordionHeaderData.paragraph: Experience the magic of science and amaze your little ones with thrilling experiments! Book a birthday party they’ll never forget.

accordionPartyData.heading: Balloon Party
accordionPartyData.description: Did you know that the balloon was practically created by accident, as a byproduct of experiments and attempts to invent a new material for inner tubes? Did you know that it was invented by a chemical engineer, Neil Tillotson? During the party, children will not only learn many interesting facts but also inflate balloons in an unusual way and learn to twist various animals and shapes. After the birthday party, everyone will return home with commemorative balloons!

accordionPartyData.heading: Meeting with Magical Chemistry
accordionPartyData.description: This is an extraordinary journey into the world of chemistry. During the party, children will perform amazing experiments, including making water disappear, summoning a Genie from a bottle, or lighting a fire without matches.

accordionPartyData.heading: The Fragrant World of Soaps
accordionPartyData.description: During the party, children will learn many interesting facts about soap, and then they will create their own unique, scented soap in a shape of their choice. It will be a kind of laboratory where participants will mix colors, scents, and other additives. In the end, they will pack the soaps and take them home.

accordionPartyData.heading: In the Land of Ice
accordionPartyData.description: Frozen experiments and hot emotions. Is ice always frozen water? Is there ice that never melts? We will perform incredible experiments using dry ice. During this expedition, we will find out what dry ice is, check if it is really so cold, and create a mysterious fog.

imagesPartyHeaderContent.paragraph: Explore captivating moments from our kindergarten. Step into the world of young learners and be inspired by the joy of discovery.

pricePartyHeaderContent.paragraph: Discover unbeatable value for your child's formative years - our commitment to affordability ensures the best care and education for them.

partyPricingData.paragraph: Bring the birthday excitement to our kindergarten for a memorable celebration!
Bring the birthday magic to your doorstep with our at-home party experience!
Customizable celebration, negotiate and arrange the ideal birthday.

heroPageWorkshops.paragraph: Explore the World of Wonder: Kids' Workshops with Mind-Blowing Experiments and Exciting Insights into Biology and More!

workshopAccordionHeaderData.paragraph: Engaging workshops designed for kindergarten and primary school children in Grades 1-3. Unlocking curiosity and inspiring lifelong learning through hands-on education.

accordionWorkshopsData.heading: Regular Workshops
accordionWorkshopsData.description: Our offer includes 30 topics to choose from, adapted to the age of children, in the field of chemistry, physics, and biology. These topics are meant to spark children's interest in science while keeping the content appropriate for their level of understanding. Whether it's chemistry, physics, or biology, our program has a variety of options for young learners to explore and enjoy.

accordionWorkshopsData.heading: Holiday Workshop
accordionWorkshopsData.description: We will make your holidays special by ensuring that your children experience a multitude of emotions on occasions such as Boy's Day, Girl's Day, St. Nicholas Day, Valentine's Day, and other holidays. Our goal is to create unforgettable moments and cherished memories for your little ones, filled with joy, surprises, and love. With our special holiday offerings, your family will celebrate these occasions with a sense of wonder and delight.

accordionWorkshopsData.heading: Picnic Workshop
accordionWorkshopsData.description: Children will have a great time at picnics and family events with us. During outdoor, corporate, and family gatherings, we will provide engaging activities, conduct experiments, games, and fun. With us, little ones will spend a joyfully unforgettable time. Fun activities at corporate picnics and family parties.

imagesWorkshopsHeaderContent.paragraph: Explore captivating moments from our kindergarten. Step into the world of young learners and be inspired by the joy of discovery.

priceWorkshopsHeaderContent.paragraph: Discover unbeatable prices for enriching workshops - our commitment to affordability ensures you get the best value for your educational endeavors.
